oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pearl High School Alumni Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Announcement of a dance to be held at the close of commencement for the class of 1919. Established in 1883 as a grammar school, Pearl became a high school in the 1897 - 1898 school year. In 1919, Pearl High School was located on 16th Avenue No. at Grant Street. 11 x 17 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pearl High School
Education; High schools
Nashville (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
